Digital Note-taking - With the emergence of various apps and gadgets like tablets, laptops, smartphones, and digital pens, people could use these to jot down notes.
Whiteboards - Large whiteboards, sticky notes, and flipcharts can serve as a way to write down important notes, equations, or ideas.
Wall Graphics or Stickers - Write on large-scale stickers or wall graphics to record information.
Digital Storage - People could digitally store information on websites or cloud storage services.
Paint and Varnish - Instead of paper, people can write on surfaces and protect them with paint or a clear varnish.
